text:
Hi Imelda,
I can help with removing the drop down nav :slightly_smiling_face:
*Error Report*, try to upload font-awesome.`woff2` files with the design-manager and get an unspecific Error message.

First time that this happend:
`fa-regular-400.woff2` works :white_check_mark:
`fa-brands-400.woff2` failed :octagonal_sign:
`fa-solid-900.woff2` failed :octagonal_sign:

How could that be?
The issue has been successfully resolved
